opinion.case_name: Fitzgerald, Treasurer of Iowa v. Racing Association of Central Iowa

opinion:
538 U.S. 974

FITZGERALD, TREASURER OF IOWA
v.
RACING ASSOCIATION OF CENTRAL IOWA ET AL.

No. 02-695.

Supreme Court of United States.

April 18, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE SUPREME COURT OF IOWA.

Sup. Ct. Iowa. [Certiorari granted, 537 U. S. 1152.] Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
